auth/app-deleted: The Firebase project associated with the authentication instance has been deleted.
auth/app-not-authorized: The authentication instance is not authorized to access the provided Firebase project.
auth/argument-error: One or more of the provided arguments for the authentication method are invalid.
auth/invalid-api-key: The provided API key is invalid.
auth/invalid-email: The email address provided is not in a valid format.
auth/user-disabled: The user account corresponding to the provided email has been disabled.
auth/user-not-found: The user account corresponding to the provided email does not exist.
auth/wrong-password: The provided password is incorrect for the given email.
auth/too-many-requests: The user has triggered too many requests in a short period of time. This error is usually rate-limited.
auth/network-request-failed: A network error occurred during the authentication process.
